title: ★SPACIOUS★ Brighton 4 Bdrm ★Avail 9/1
posting_body: Walkable to Wholefood, train station and cafes.
Hardwood floor throughout and laundry is in building.
This big kitchen has been renovated with cherry cabinets, granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.
